name: Anexty
description:
This game was made by 2 people in about 48 hours as part of a self imposed game jam with the "Can't stop moving" theme.
The game doesn't have much of a story, it's a university student going around his house to fetch items required to study for an upcoming exam, while anxiety is slowly creeping up to him. Anexty is a mashup of "An exam anxiety".

How to play:
Move: WASD or Arrow Keys
Interact with object: Changes every time, refer to the in game UI.
You'll have to find four objects around the house (Book, Paper sheet, Pen and a Cup of tea), after that you'll be able to study at the desk in your room.

Thank you all for playing, any feedback is appreciated.
